These movies allow me to both think and feel at the same time. Every time I think I caught and solved the little puzzle they put there for me it satisfies my silly ego that wants to believe that I m intelligent. The story within a story structure of this film is very effective ; the stories are wound together to feed and fuel each other The unfiltered emotion of Edward fed right into us through the man uscript and Susan s through her reaction to it The structure forces us to think about the duality and we start to speculate who in the book corresponds to who in reality. At first we think so Edward is Edward and Susan is Susan .." but as we know from later in the story the relationship between the two world is not as simple as it seems but Tom helps us by dropping obvious hints in brilliant ways He cast Isla Fisher for the Book Susan rather than Amy Adams and we quickly realize Book Susan is not representing Susan in reality ," and it enable us to think more about other characters in the book ; Who s this frightening Aaron Taylor Johnson supposed to be ?" And so on I had to keep thinking and at the same time cope with t he not so subtle emotional elements in the story. .. so I was glad the pace of the film was not too fast. The film is of course quite beautifully shot the look and feel related to each character are consistent I mean Tom Ford is Tom Ford an aesthetic perfectionist Awesome.
